warzone.state

Class GamePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • warzone.state.Phase
      • warzone.state.GamePlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IssueOrder, OrderExecution, Reinforcement, Startup

    public abstract class GamePlay
extends Phase
    ConcreteState of the State pattern. In this example, defines behavior for commands that are valid in this state, and for the others signifies that the command is invalid.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
